title: [BUG] Resize redraw duplicates history and prompt box
description: RNK UI: resizing from larger to smaller width causes reprinted history below old content and prompt-box artifacts in scrollback. Need single canonical history repaint and bottom-only prompt.

logs.msg: User repro: resizing from half-screen to one-third duplicates chat block and leaves prompt box separators in history. Desired: single history copy, bottom prompt only, consistent spacing.

Implemented resize redraw fix: Event::Resize now forces redraw without needs_reflow; overlap handling now ScrollViewport pre-op instead of full transcript reflow, preventing duplicate history/prompt-box artifacts.

Validation: cargo check -q and cargo test -q pass. cargo clippy --all-targets -D warnings fails on pre-existing project-wide lint backlog (duplicated cfg attr in provider/openai_compat/tests.rs, chat_renderer map_or, rnk_spike too_many_arguments, test lint issues); no new failures from resize patch.
